description.brief: A Microsoft Kinect camera ROS driver

package.description:
A general purpose ROS driver for the Microsoft XBOX 360 Kinect sensor. The driver publishes: * RGB image data * depth data as PointCloud and PointCloud2 * ...
There are two versions of the driver: a standard ROS node, and a nodelet.
